categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Eli was a male Human Jedi Padawan living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he, along with Varek, Cassius and Ashara Zavros, was brought to Taris to train under Jedi Masters Ryen and Ocera, whose philosophy was that Padawans best learned the travails of using the Force through firsthand experience of the galaxy.
Eli appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Taris.
